features: “Sometimes you just need a fresh start. This clarifying shampoo removes mineral deposits, product buildup, excess oils, and even silicones that can build up over time. Use this when needed to get a deeper clean.” - Kristin Ess
Cleanse + Condition: A clean, well-conditioned canvas is essential. These universal products cleanse + deeply condition to leave hair feeling moisturized, full and looking shiny from root to tip.
For all hair types, Buildup removing, Purifying + volumizing, Shine enhancing, Mineral detoxifying, Super sudsing

How To: Depending on the thickness of your hair, squeeze a dime to quarter-sized amount of shampoo into your palm. Apply to wet hair, massaging into the scalp to create a rich lather. Add more shampoo if desired. Rinse thoroughly and repeat if necessary.
Cruelty free + vegan, free of parabens, phthalates + silicones
body.description: Contains Zip-Up Technology, our proprietary strengthening complex designed to "zip-up" split ends while targeting weak areas of the hair, smoothing the appearance of damaged cuticles and helping to protect hair from environmental stressors and color fade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is great. The fragrance is so fresh and clean. Abundance lather, and my hair is soft and bouncy when dry. I am getting ready to purchase another bottle..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was the best clarifying shampoo and best shampoo in general I’ve ever found! It’s like a magic potion and resets my hair whenever I use it (usually every three weeks or so) when the oil buildup in my hair gets too much. It leaves my hair completely oil free but also shiny and moisturized and works well with my wavy thick hair. It also smells amazing and I’ve never had a shampoo smell so good that I can smell it in my hair the next two days. I’m going to be trying other shampoo from this brand because I was so impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I did a lot of research on protein buildup and came to the conclusion that was what was going on with my hair. There were lots of suggestions and most of them were kind of pricey. This one came highly recommended and was in a decent price range for a trial product.First and foremost the other posts are correct, it does in fact smell amazing. Even a few hours after washing I can still smell it. I used a quarter size amount of shampoo as suggested on bottle and I didn’t find it to lather that well? Maybe it’s not meant too, I’m not sure. I added a little bit more. I was a little bit more generous with the conditioner as I felt my hair might need the moisturizing. I left the conditioner in for 3 mins or so before washing out. As soon as I started brushing it I could tell it worked, it was so easy to brush through and felt super healthy. I can definitely say it feels like a deep clean for sure for the scalp and hair. I use a lot of oils, styling products and hair coloring so I feel my hair really needed this cleanse. Great product to add to your hair care regimen! Not as a daily/main shampoo! Only use once/twice a month to keep hair healthy!Worth the buy! No hair loss here (I was nervous reading the other reviews to be honest)!Scent is floral like and smells really good!Made my hair feel amazing, glad I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shiny and smooth hair
reviews.reviewText: I love that after washing my hair with this shampoo my hair feels so shiny and smooth. So clean idk if you can see it in the picture but this is a day after washing it with the shampoo which is once a week for me. As of now I had hair loss and I just went to get a haircut and my hairstylist said he felt my hair fuller the only different thing I have changed is this shampoo once a week and then the rest of the week I wash it with my Garnier fructis shampoo. Since it has been so hot here in Texas I have been washing my hair daily I can't stand sweaty hair and plus my hair is so oily from my scalp so this shampoo gets a thumbs up for me. It is a little drying but I do use a thick conditioner in my ends only when I use the clarifying shampoo just like any clarifying shampoo 😅. I love the smell it smells fresh and clean. The price is good I don't use it often but when I feel like my scalp needs a little more than just shampoo I go ahead and use it. I would say every hair is different but trying it is worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo smells so good. It cleans well and leaves my hair shiny. The smell lingers slightly once dry. I use this about once every 2 weeks to deep clean my hair and scalp. The bottle is beautiful. Highly recommend this shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite clarifying shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: The greatest addition to my hair regimen. This clarifying shampoo gets rid of all the product buildup on my hair and scalp and doesn’t strip my color or ruin my extensions. Plus, it smells amazing and is really affordable. I love the purple shampoo too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing clarifying shampoo
reviews.reviewText: This product is a godsend for my 3A curls. It can be hard to find a clarifying shampoo that isn’t totally stripping, but this Kristen Ess shampoo is it! It lathers beautifully and makes my hair feel so clean. I only use this ~once a month because I don’t like clarifying more often than that. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Makes head itchy
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to help with recently developed problem with very greasy hair. While it does smell nice and cleans the hair well (the greasiness seems to have gotten a tad better), my scalp itches like crazy on the 2nd day after wash. So much so that I had to switch back to different shampoos...
This shampoo left my hair feeling incredibly clean without stripping it and leaving it feeling dry. I highly recommend this shampoo and will be purchasing again and again and again!
My hair looked so great for one day but my scalp got very itchy and I had to discontinue.

reviews.reviewTitle: Can’t describe how clean my hair is
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to get rid of buildup on my scalp from other shampoos and conditioners. It literally wipes the slate clean. I only use every 4th hair wash and it significantly helped with built up dandruff and junk

Product was shipped without enclosing it in a protective bag as with all other Amazon orders. Product leaked. I contacted seller but never heard back but was asked to rate my experience so here we are... without being able to verify if the product had been tampered with, I chose to use it. I didn't want to return something that is leaking. The product smells very strong. I don't find it any better than Netrogena clarifying shampoo. Won't buy again.
